Andvari.name: Andvari

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

Andvari.description: Andvari doesn't like it when others call him a legend. He believes the Titan Artifacts he created are merely a necessity in the war against evil. However, his talent, honesty, and eagerness to work make it obvious that the element of Earth made the right choice!

White.name: Titan's Fist
White.description: Strikes the nearest Enemy and deal damage with a giant fist. Stunning him and nearby allies for 3 seconds

Green.name: Living Earth
Green.description: Passive Skill: Protects all allies behind him from displacement and knock up effects
Green.calculation: N/A

Blue.name: Stone Grasp
Blue.description: Summons a stone Hand that targets the lowest health enemy with physical damage, and stunning for 2 seconds
Blue.calculation: 80% Phys. atk. +9600

Violet.name: Nature's Barrier
Violet.description: Creates a barrier that shields the lowest Armor ally from physical and pure damage with his ally gaining energy for absorbed damage

Arachne.name: Arachne

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Arachne.description: There’s no trace of humanity left in her: she's a perfect assassin now. Arachne's hypnotic gaze freezes her prey, and her claws tear the unfortunate victim apart.

White.name: Demolition Robot
White.description: Summons a monster that charges at the first enemy it sees, exploding and stunning enemies for 2 seconds.

Green.name: Teleport
Green.description: Jumps to the target with the lowest health, attacks it with claws, and jumps back.

Blue.name: Underground Strike
Blue.description: Strikes the nearest rival, damaging and stunning them and the enemies around them for 3 seconds. (Stun chance lowered if the target's level is above 80.)

Violet.name: Neurotoxin
Violet.description: Any damage received from Arachne, poisons the enemy for 3 seconds.

Artemis.name: Artemis

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

Artemis.description: The huntress fades into a shadow in the night. Reaching the sorceress, she kills her immediately. Remember, witgh, death has a name, and that name is Artemis.

White.name: Deadly Shower
White.description: Artemis launches a barrage of shots, striking enemies with a rain of arrows. (Damage per arrow = (Physical attack stat + skill level x 100)/10)

Green.name: Smart Arrow
Green.description: Fires an arrow at the nearest target that deals damage and bounces to random enemies several times.

Blue.name: True Light
Blue.description: Creates a flash of light that deals damage to all enemies caught in it and blinds them for 3 seconds.

Violet.name: Punishing Arrows
Violet.description: Passive skill. With each attach Artemis deals additional damage depending on her remaining health.

Astaroth.name: Astaroth

artifacts.book: Defender's Covenant (Armor, Magic defense)

Astaroth.description: Astaroth's scorching blade emanates unbearable heat. His eyes burn with infernal flame. Rejected by God, this angel was filled with rage. His only goal is to burn this world to ashes.

White.name: Flame Veil
White.description:
Casts a shield that blocks physical damage on the entire team. The shield's capacity is shared between all team members. (100% Magic attack + 1000 + 100 • level)

The shield does not persist between fights in the campaign.

Green.name: Devastation
Green.description: Astaroth spews a flare of hellfire, burning up some of the energy accumulated by the furthest enemy. If the opponent's level is above the skill level, the chance to burn their energy is decreased. (25% + .1 • level)
Green.calculation: Energy burned: 37%. If the opponent's level is above 120, the chance to burn their energy is decreased.

Blue.name: Demon's Allegiance
Blue.description: Passive Skill: Astaroth maintains a connection with the ally who has the least health left and takes on a part of the physical damage inflicted against that ally. The transferred damage is also reduced. (Transfers 37% + .1 • level % of physical damage. An extra 18% + .15 • level % is subtracted from the transferred damage)
Blue.calculation: Transfers 47% of physical damage. An extra 33% is subtracted from the transferred damage.

Violet.name: Last Word
Violet.description: Once per battle, Astaroth resurrects a fallen ally or himself. (health restored by the resurrection 100% Magic attack +15000 + 250 • level)

Astrid.name: Astrid and Lucas

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

Astrid.description: Astrid embraced the furry neck of her pet. Lucas didn't mind, for it could understand she needed it more than before. It was only yesterday that the young woman's eyes were full of life, and now her gaze was stern, frigid. Everything they had to go through fused their hearts into one.

White.name: Go For It, Lucas!
White.description: Astrid's pet transforms into rage form and rushes to the front row, taking the enemy's attacks on itself. It takes no damage from the attacks, but each attack abates its rage until the pet reverts to its passive form.

Green.name: Rampant Nature
Green.description: Astrid increases her attack speed and skill speed by 9 seconds. If Lucas is in rage form, the increases affect it instead of Astrid.
Green.calculation: Attack and skill speed increased by 153%

Blue.name: Predator's Charge
Blue.description: Passive Skill. As long as Lucas is in rage form, each consecutive attack deals increasing damage.
Blue.calculation: Increase in damage with each attack:6.5%

Violet.name: Tracker's Mark
Violet.description: Passive Skill. Each of Astrid's attacks marks the target hi with the Tracker's mark for 4 seconds. If Lucas hits a marked enemy it is stunned for a short time.
Violet.calculation: Chance to stun is lowered if the target's level is above 120.

Aurora.name: Aurora

artifacts.book: Book of Illusions (Dodge, Health)

Aurora.description: As a child Aurora chose to follow the light.She left her house and went a long way to finally receive the title of Paladin of Riversar, thus becoming a protector and lantern for her people.

White.name: Crystal of Selias
White.description: Group MA damage.

Green.name: Crystalline Onslaught
Green.description: Stun and MA damage to 1 nearby target. Stun chance lower if target level < skill level.

Blue.name: Piercing Light
Blue.description: MA damage to targets along a line.
Blue.calculation: 40% Magic. atk. +3600

Violet.name: Rainbow Halo
Violet.description: Passive. Partially absorbs magic damage. Explodes for damage when full. 40% absorption to start.
Violet.calculation: The shield absorbs 80% of magic damage

Celeste.name: Celeste

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic Penetration, Magic attack)

Celeste.description: Just like day flows into night, Celeste changes her form. Gleaming sunlight grants life while the shadow of night opens up her darker traits. Nobody knows if she can keep that delicate balance under control for much longer...

White.name: Two Fates
White.description: Celeste switches between light and dark forms. When switching to light, she creates a purifying sphere that heals the ally with least health for five seconds. When switching to dark, she creates an area of cursed flame among the enemies, the damage from which cannot be cured.
White.calculation: In Dark Form - total healing blocked: 70% Mag. atk +42000. In Light Form - health restored: 70% Mag. atk +12000.

Green.name: White Night
Green.description: When dark, she surrounds the nearest enemy with cursed flame. When light shes cures the ally with the least health.
Green.calculation: In Dark Form - total healing blocked: 70% Mag. atk +30000. In Light Form - 70% Mag. at +12000.

Blue.name: Limbo
Blue.description: Cursed flames will change healing sent to flame damaged enemy into additional damage. The purifying sphere clears and blocks all negative effects of the ally before disappearing.
Blue.calculation: In Dark Form - 40% of healing blocked is convertedto magic damage. In Light Form - chance to block a debuff is lowered when battling higher-level opponents 120.

Violet.name: Zenith
Violet.description: When dark, basic attacks deal magic damage and when light target allies with healing.
Violet.calculation: In Dark Form - magic damage: 70% Mag. atk +18000. In Light Form - health restored: 40% Mag. atk +18000.

Chabba.name: Chabba

artifacts.book: Defender's Covenant (Armor, Magic Defence)

Chabba.description: Chabba loves every kind of food in the world, but especially Haan-style cutlets. Chabba has thick, impenetrable skin, which means nobody can stop him on his quest for tasty treats.

White.name: Wild Hunger
White.description: Swallows the current target for 6 seconds. While the target is swallowed, it slowly receives damage. Depends on Physical attack.

Green.name: Burp
Green.description: Damages nearby enemies, slowing them for 4 seconds. Depends on Physical attack.

Blue.name: Fat Layer
Blue.description: Increases armor, proportionally to missing health. Depends on Physical attack.

Violet.name: Bottomless Belly
Violet.description: Now Chabba restores health by digesting the swallowed enemy.

Cleaver.name: Cleaver

artifacts.book: Defender's Covenant (Armor, Magic defense)

Cleaver.description: Can you smell decomposition? Can you hear the dying screams of those who suffer? Then meet Cleaver, butcher extraordinaire and master of carcass dressing! Or better run for your life before you meet him!

White.name: Rusty Hook
White.description: Cleaver throws a hook at a distant opponent, dealing damage, and pulls them to himself.

Green.name: Putrefaction
Green.description: Deals pure damage to the nearest opponents and himself for 5 seconds.
Green.calculation: Damage: 25% Phys. atk +4800

Blue.name: Mutilation
Blue.description: Hits the area in front of him with his cleaver, dealing damage and stunning opponents.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 20% Phys. atk +3600

Violet.name: Heavyweight
Violet.description: Passive skill. Cleaver receives additional Strength.

Cornelius.name: Cornelius

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Cornelius.description: After the dark mages raided the university, scholar Cornelius Witt was believed to be dead. In fact, he was held captive by the enemy for about two years. The mages' spell tortures not only failed to break him down, but also helped him discover a new ability, the suppression of magic. He used to escape and joined the ranks of Guardians.

White.name: Heavy Wisdom
White.description: Hits the enemy with the highest Intelligence with a monolith, dealing physical damage proportionally to their Intelligence.
White.calculation: Damage per 100 Intelligence points of the target: 10% Mag atk +2400

Green.name: Rune of Suppression
Green.description: An ancient spell which hits the enemy with the highest Magic attack and reduces their Attack for the next 12 seconds. Depends on Magic attack.
Green.calculation: Temporary Magic attack reduction: 40% Mag. atk +9000

Blue.name: Protective Dome
Blue.description: Cornelius casts a barrier on the team, increasing their Magic defense for 6 seconds. Depends on Magic attack.
Blue.calculation: Temporary Magic defense increase: 25% Mag. atk +4100

Violet.name: Memory Loss
Violet.description: Cornelius curses a random enemy at the beginning of the battle, reducing the level of their first skill. If Cornelius dies, the curse will disappear.
Violet.calculation: Target's first skill level decreases by: 90

Dante.name: Dante

artifacts.book: Book of Illusions (Dodge, Health)

Dante.description: Everything has its price, even the human soul. But our hero loves a bargain: he'll gladly take it for free. Don't worry, Dante will take  care  of your  soul as if  it was  his own!

White.name: Instrument of Fate
White.description: Throws a ghost spear passing through the enemies. Deals decreasing damage on each successive enemy it hits

Green.name: Haze
Green.description: Creates a shield that blocks all damage and negative effects for 2,5 seconds

Blue.name: Spiritual Bond
Blue.description: Binds Dante to a random ally and increases their speed for 4 seconds

Violet.name: Phantom Pain
Violet.description: Passive skill: Improves Agility for all Heros

Daredevil.name: Daredevil

artifacts.book: Warrior's Code (Physical attack, Crit hit chance)

Daredevil.description: What is life? Life is an endless war. How to become happy in life? Start enjoying this war obviously. Daredevil doesn't care about her lost arm as the new one, made of steel, is much, much cooler. She plays it really close to the edge each and every day and she knows the real taste of life!

White.name: Big Badda Boom!
White.description: Throws a bomb at the center of the enemy team. The explosion deals damage to the affected enemies, sets them on fire for 7 seconds, and pushes them away.

Green.name: Discharge!
Green.description: Electrocutes the nearest enemy, dealing damage. The target and other enemies close to them are stunned for 1 second, and their attack speed and movement speed are decreased for 3 seconds.
Green.calculation: Damage: 25% Phys. atk +5400

Blue.name: Firefight
Blue.description: Fires an incendiary shell at the nearest enemy, dealing damage and setting them and other nearby enemies on fire for 5 seconds.
Blue.calculation: Chance to deal damage decreases if the target's level is above 120

Violet.name: Thirst for Blood
Violet.description: Daredevil ignores a portion of the armor of enemies she has set on fire.
Violet.calculation: Physical attack increases by: 3% Phys. atk +600

Dark Star.name: Dark Star

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Physical attack, Armor penetration)

Dark Star.description: A dark elf who survived betrayal  and the death of her loved ones. She has remained the same, though her heart is deeply scarred. She is Dark Star, a dark elf with a bright soul.

White.name: Black Arrows
White.description: Shoots two arrows at distant targets, damaging and stunning them for 3 seconds. Stun chance is lowered if the target's level is above the level of the skill.

Green.name: Vengeful Souls
Green.description: Dark Star uses sonic waves to slow and deal damage to rivals. Can slow enemies with a higher level then the skill.
Green.calculation: 10% Phys. atk. + 6000

Blue.name: Control
Blue.description: Forces the nearest target to fight on the caster's side fo 4 seconds. Success chance lowered if the target's level is above (skill level + 20).
Blue.calculation: Success chance lowered if the target's level is above 120

Violet.name: Partner
Violet.description: After every shot Dark Star creates a shadow that attacks the next enemy, dealing damage based on Physical attack. The shadow's arrows deal 25.5% +.5% • level.
Violet.calculation: The shadow's arrows deal 65% of damage

Dorian.name: Dorian

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Dorian.description: As a young man dorian stole a red stone amulet to gift it to his beloved. But he didn't give it to her and became the amulets's slave. Dorian did what it wanted and committed terrible acts. How difficult was it for him to overcome this burden! The reward for freedom was a special gift - the blood magic. Since that, the forever-young mage has been the amulet's master. But who knows for how long?

White.name: Fountain of Blood
White.description: Casts a blood mark on the nearest rival for 7 seconds. Allies recover health whenever they attack a marked enemy. Recovered health: 25% + (1 • skill level).

Green.name: Ancestors' Amulet
Green.description: Dorian sacrifices 20% of his current health and heals an ally with lowest health. Ally healing: 100% • 1 per 2 skill levels.
Green.calculation: Ally healing: 160% of sacrificed health

Blue.name: Wings of Night
Blue.description: Releases a flock of bats which hit the opponents twice. When returned to the owner, they replenish his health at the 100% amount of the damage done. Damage depends on Magic attack.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 11% Mag. atk +4100

Violet.name: Initiation
Violet.description: Increases Vampirism of nearby allies. Vampirism Aura is 25% + 1 • skill level

Elmir.name: Elmir

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

Elmir.description: Only true heroes are worth of wielding legendary weapons. The Blades of Many Truths have a mind of their own, and take only those who are worthy as their partners. Elmir is following the right path and knows that even among many truths there is one that reigns supreme!

White.name: Shifting Sands
White.description: Moves to the far line, uses his second skill if applicable, and fires off ranged attacks for 10 seconds, with a Physical attack bonus while active

Green.name: Mirage
Green.description: Elmir creates a sand clone of himself with 70 of his health, but it cannot receive help from allies or regenerate health
Green.calculation: Clone percentage of hero's health: 70%

Blue.name: Perfect Blades
Blue.description: Allows sand clones to attack enemies
Blue.calculation: Clone attack damage: 15% Phys. atk +5000

Violet.name: Many Truth
Violet.description: Allows Elmir to create two or four sand clones at the same time
Violet.calculation: 80% chance of creating two copies. 40% chance of creating four copies

Faceless.name: Faceless

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic Penetration, Magic attack)

Faceless.description: Faceless, the best apprentice at the School of Mystics, was never especially favored by his mentors. A silent type who had a unique talent, he scared people around him. Nobody knows what's hiding behind his dark mask...

White.name: Doppelganger
White.description: Turns into the enemy or ally, who was last one to used the first skill, and uses that skill

Green.name: Power Throw
Green.description: Raises the nearest enemy above the ground, then drops them at the center of the enemy team. Deals damage and stuns all enemies in the effective range for 2 seconds. (Chance to stun is lowered if the target's level is above skill's level.)
Green.calculation: Damage: 30% Mag. atk +1800

Blue.name: Chain Lightning
Blue.description: Throws a ricocheting magic missile that hits 3 enemies. Deals damage and lowers the target's Physical attack for 4 seconds.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 30% Mag. atk +4700. Physical attack reduction: -1800

Violet.name: Spell Expert
Violet.description: Passive skill. Increases the team's Magic defense.

Fox.name: Fox

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

Fox.description: Nobody has ever seen an expression of anger or doubt on this cute face. On the contrary, Fox is like a bright light in the darkness, filling her allies' hearts with joy and courage. Once she grabs her gun, the enemy has no chance.

White.name: Heavy Caliber
White.description: Fires a heavy projectile at the nearest target , dealing physical damage and throwing the target back.

Green.name: Smoke Screen
Green.description: Fire's a smoke grenade into the enemy's front row, blinding nearby heroes for 6 seconds. The heavy caliber skill may now also blinds the enemy's front row.
Green.calculation: Chance to blind lowered if the target's level is above 120

Blue.name: Cannonade
Blue.description: Shoots the nearest target six times.
Blue.calculation: Damage per hit: 15% Phys. atk +4200

Violet.name: Concussion
Violet.description: Passive skill; Heavy Caliber stuns the target for 5 seconds.
Violet.calculation: Chance to stun lowered if the target's level is above 120

Galahad.name: Galahad

artifacts.book: Defender's Covenant (Armor, Magic defense)

Galahad.description: Knowing no fear or doubt, sturdy as Harunian steel, Galahad moves only forward. His confidence in himself and his allies has kept the great warrior strong for many years.

White.name: Iron Skies
White.description: Galahad brings down swords of justice on the enemies' heads. Depends on Physical attack.

Green.name: Unstoppable Charge
Green.description: Dashes forward, removing control effects and dealing damage to enemies nearby. Depends on Physical attack.
Green.calculation: Damage: 50% Phys. atk +6000

Blue.name: Retaliation
Blue.description: Performs a special move, striking the enemy with the lowest health.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 80% Phys. atk +5000

Violet.name: Harun's Pride
Violet.description: The Iron Skies skill now deals an extra X damage. Depends on Physical attack.

Ginger.name: Ginger

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

Ginger.description: Duke's daughter Ginger Hayes isn't fond of noble evenings and quiet gossips.She is very into science and modern technology, using its powers to protect the innocent from the offspring of darkness. The best helper here is her own creation - the chain-gun "Noble."

White.name: Lead Storm
White.description: 7 quick rounds of PA damage to all.

Green.name: Penetrating Shot
Green.description: Hits an enemy and the enemy directly behind.
Green.calculation: 60% Phys. atk. + 7800

Blue.name: Suppressive Fire
Blue.description: PA damage to all.
Blue.calculation: 20% Phys. atk. + 4700

Violet.name: Ranging Shot
Violet.description: Each consecutive shot gains physical dmg. Effect ends when Ginger gets a control effect or her target dies.

Heidi.name: Heidi

artifacts.book: Book of Illusions (Dodge, Health)

Heidi.description: Enchanted by Heidi's looks? You're dead. You've kept your head on a swivel, sleept with both eyes open? No use! An experienced ranger tracks their prey with ease, and the meeting won't be pretty!

White.name: Deathflower
White.description: Creates a toxic mushroom in the middle of the opponents. Close Opponents will suffer Poison damage every 3 seconds.

Green.name: Toxic Spit
Green.description: Shoots Arrow against the closest enemy. Poison does pure damage per 5 seconds

Blue.name: Snake Charmer
Blue.description: Throws a snake against the weakest opponent. Pure damage

Violet.name: Spy Camo
Violet.description: Heidi gets camouflage when she doesn't get damaged for some seconds. Dodge will increase by time. Not valid for control effects.
Violet.calculation: Chance to dodge increases gradually from 20% to 80%

Helios.name: Helios

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Helios.description: Helios is a star-child. An orphan who tried to catch a fallen star and found his destiny. The cosmic wonder's powerful energy changed the boy forever. Now the stars serve the herald of the Sun, and the celestial rays are his loyal pets.

White.name: Star Birth
White.description: Helios directs 3 new and all existing solar spheres to the frontline of an enemy team where they explode, dealing area damage.

Green.name: Solar Wind
Green.description: Summons an invulnerable flamming sphere, dealing damage to nearbt enemies over time for 14 seconds.
Green.calculation: Damage over time: 10% Mag. atk +1200

Blue.name: Celestial Guardians
Blue.description: Summons 2 protection spheres at the center of your team. The spheres protect nearby allies by absorbing physical damage dealt to them.
Blue.calculation: Each sphere can absorb 90% Mag. atk +15000

Violet.name: Flaming Retribution
Violet.description: Each time Helios' allies get critical hit, the flaming sphere may damage the attacker with a fire beam.

Ishmael.name: Ishmael

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

Ishmael.description: How does it feel to kill a parent who wanted to sacrifice their own child to evil gods? ishmael experienced this first-hand. Defeating his father wasn't easy: the sorcerer's dark soul remained with his son. Since then Ishmael has been leading a double life, fighting the inner demon.

White.name: Awakening
White.description: Assumes a demonic form that increases critical hit chance and attack speed. Ishmael starts to gradually lose energy; when it reaches 0, the demonic form dissipates.

Green.name: Mirage
Green.description: Dodges Physical attacks for 3 seconds
Green.calculation: Chance to dodge lowered if the target's level is higher than 120

Blue.name: Dark Craft
Blue.description: Passive skill. Increases vampirism
Blue.calculation: Vampirism: 60%

Violet.name: Storm Blades
Violet.description: Every 4th hit stuns the opponent for 1 round
Violet.calculation: Chance to stun is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Jet.name: Jet

artifacts.book: Book of Illusions (Dodge, Health)

Jet.description: You should not underestimate Jet, the insect exterminator from Tornville! Fascinated by his craft and science, he would spend all of his time in the laboratory. A simple goblin who found a way not only to poison other creatures, but also to heal them and evolve their skills, he quickly caught the attention of the Guardians.

White.name: Elixir of Vigor
White.description: Channels life energy to the ally with the highest Physical attack stats. Ally gets Physical attack and speed boost and regenerates health until Jet runs out of energy or gets interrupted
White.calculation: Physical attack boost: 20% Mag. atk +6000, Health regen per second: 25% Mag. atk +6000

Green.name: Acid Shot
Green.description: Fires acid against the hero with the highest armor stats, reducing the stats for 8 seconds
Green.calculation: Temporary Armor Reduction: 10% Mag. atk +3000

Blue.name: Poison of Fatigue
Blue.description: Throws a bottle of poison against the next enemy. This enemy can't regenerate health for the next 8 seconds
Blue.calculation: Potion effect chance is lowered for enemies above level 120

Violet.name: Inordinate Fury
Violet.description: Passive skill: increases the critical hit chance for all allies as long as he is alive
Violet.calculation: Critical hit chance bonus: 2.5% Mag. atk +1300

Jhu.name: Jhu

artifacts.book: Warrior's Code (Crit hit chance, Physical attack)

Jhu.description: "The glorious warrior of the tribe has no right to pity! He who is found guilty of it will be stripped of all decorations, and will be banished!" so says the third law of the Zarakkar. Jhu broke the rules, but found the meaning of life.

White.name: You will not stop me
White.description:
Jhu becomes enraged for 7 seconds, significantly increasing his attack speed. While enraged, Jhu cannot die.

Speed Bonus.

Green.name: I will take your life
Green.description:
Each of Jhu's attacks deals additional pure damage to the target while sacrificing 2% of their own current health.

Extra damage: X% of the enemy's current health.
Green.calculation: Extra damage: 4.4% of the enemy's current health.

Blue.name: I see you
Blue.description:
For a period of time Jhu, increases his attack power and focuses his attacks on a ranged enemy. Depends on Physical attack.

Extra Damage: (25% Phys. atk. + X)

Duration: X sec.
Blue.calculation: 25% Phys. atk. + 5500

Violet.name: The spirits will heal me
Violet.description:
If Jhu is not under control effects after the first skill is used, he regenerates some health. Depends on Physical attack.

Recovered health: (65% Phys. atk+1000)

Jorgen.name: Jorgen

artifacts.book: Defender's Covenant (Armor, Magic defense)

Jorgen.description: "You are ready to learn arcane knowledge, disciple. But first prove your loyalty to Darkness. Take your brother's life, and his immortal soul!" the wizard yelled. But he, nor anyone else, could have predicted how this tragedy would end...

White.name: Torment of Powerlessness
White.description: Jorgen summons a skull to the enemy's front line which deals magic damage to nearby heroes. Affected enemies can not gain energy for 9 seconds.

Green.name: Cycle of Energies
Green.description: Protects an ally with a magic shield. The ally will gain energy at doubled rate until the shield is destroyed.
Green.calculation: The shield can absorb 70% Mag. atk +15000 damage of any type

Blue.name: Leper
Blue.description: Jorgen curses everyone on the enemy team, making the furthest enemy the target of the curse. Physical damage taken by heroes on the enemy team will be redirected to the target of the curse for 10 seconds.
Blue.calculation: This skill redirects all physical damage to enemies level 120 and lower. Only a part of the damage is redirected to higher level enemies

Violet.name: Tainted Wounds
Violet.description: With every attack Jorgen steals some of the affected enemies energy.

Judge.name: Judge

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Judge.description: If you're reading this, Judge has won. No, mere earthly matters don't concern him. The best son of his people, the bravest of the Old Ones, he is the guardian of the Universe.

White.name: Ion Cyclone
White.description: Creates a lightning storm that deals magic damage to every 4 times

Green.name: Force Field
Green.description: Casts a shield that absorbs all damage on the ally with the lowest health

Blue.name: Hologram
Blue.description: Using talent, Judge is cleared of all the negative effects and all blocks the next attack, transforming the damage received into health

Violet.name: Interference Generator
Violet.description: Passive skill. Lower the enemy team's magical defense

K'arkh.name: K'arkh

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

K'arkh.description: Bolts of lightning shatter the skies of Dagan-Nuhr. Tendrils of darkness lash and strike in a mad dance, flowing in the magnetic storms. The Outland gate is open, and you must pass second through them, following after Brog. K'arkh, one of the four Negators of All Creation, look behind! You see these skies for the last time!

White.name: Nexus of Horror
White.description: K'arkh throws into the air three enemies with the lowest health. When the affected enemies fall back down, they are stunned for 2 seconds.
White.calculation: Chance to stun is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Green.name: Negator of Laws
Green.description: K'arkh opens an interdimensional rift that can block enemy Physical attacks for 8 seconds. The hero gets extra energy for each attack blocked.
Green.calculation: Block chance for Physical attacks: 50%, Extra energy for a blocked attack: 15%

Blue.name: Deadly Tendrils
Blue.description: While K'arkh is alive, he strikes every enemy who was thrown into the air. If the enemy level is equal to or less than K'arkh's Level, K'arkh deals double damage.
Blue.calculation: Damage from attack: 100% Phys. atk, Chance to deal double damage is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Violet.name: Survival Factor
Violet.description: Attacks against enemies thrown into the air heal the hero for a fraction of the damage dealt.

Kai.name: Kai

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic penetration, Magic attack)

Kai.description: There's nothing in the world but magic, and Kai is a true magical genius. Rejected by his own race, the mage left  his home. Everybody who thinks Kai prides himself too much is just jealous!

White.name: Fetters of the Wind
White.description: Kai launches a tornado that throws targets and deals damage to enemies, Chance depends on level of opponent. Damage depends on Magic attack.

Green.name: Breath of the Abyss
Green.description: Summons a flame pillar, dealing damage to close enemies. Damage depends on Magic attack.
Green.calculation: 30% Mag atk. +2400

Blue.name: Explosive Sphere
Blue.description: Throws a fire sphere, to the next enemy for 3 seconds, then explodes dealing more damage. The sphere and explosion damage both depend on Magic attack.

Violet.name: Stolen Life
Violet.description: Passive Skill: Increases Vampirism by 20%.

Keira.name: Keira

artifacts.book: Alchemist's Folio (Armor penetration, Physical attack)

Keira.description: Captain Keira was once one of the best Royal Guards who has fallen in battle against Mort Chronos. The demon of war has resurrected the young guard and turned her into a ghost foredoomed to suffer and wander around until the end of time.

White.name: Blade Whirlwind
White.description: Keira launches a whirlwind of blades. The blades reach the furthest enemy and then return, dealing damage to enemies as they fly and silencing them for 4 seconds on the way back. Chance to silence is lowered if the target's level is above your level.

Green.name: Enraged Soul
Green.description: Keira's speed increases for 5 seconds.
Green.calculation: Attack and skill speed increased by 290%

Blue.name: Dancing Blades
Blue.description: Passive skill. Keira's basic attack can ricochet between enemies. The chance to ricochet is lowered if the target's level is above your level.
Blue.calculation: Chance to ricochet is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Violet.name: Piercing Pain
Violet.description: Passive skill. If the enemy's armor is lower than Kiera's Armor penetration, she deals extra damage. Extra damage depends on your Physical attack.

Krista.name: Krista

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Krista.description: Krista has never known her parents. But her loneliness helped the orphan to better understand her mysterious talent for ice magic. Her life was transformed when she saved a young mage from certain death. The sorceress recognized him as her brother, Lars, who had been separated from her since birth. Krista became his loyal partner.

White.name: Icy Vengeance
White.description: Hits enemies one by one with 6 ice crystals, dealing area damage. Depends on Magic attack.

Green.name: Chains of Frost
Green.description: Krista hits the enemies in the center of an enemy's team, temporarily reducing their Magic defense and applying a Mark of Water to them. Magic defense reduction depends on Magic attack.
Green.calculation: Temporary Magic defense reduction: 5% Mag. atk +1200, Chance to apply skill effects is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Blue.name: Frozen Needles
Blue.description: Freezes the ground under the feet of an enemy's team, filling the zone with ice thorns. Any movement through the area deals damage to enemies. When the thorns melt, all heroes standing on them get a Mark of Water. Depends on Magic attack.
Blue.calculation: Damage upone movement: 12% Mag. atk +3000

Violet.name: Crystallization
Violet.description: When in danger of taking major damage, Krista summons an ice block that protects the caster for 2 seconds by partially absorbing any incoming damage.

Lars.name: Lars

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic penetration, Magic attack)

Lars.description: Lars is a young northern mage. Naturally gifted in elemental magic, he lived prosperously and had the best teachers. Selfish and arrogant, Lars never offered his help for free. Everything changed when his life fell into the hands of his twin sister, who had been separated from Lars since birth.

White.name: Lord of the Storm
White.description: Lars summons a storm at the enemy's backline, dragging heroes to its eye and applying a Mark of Water to each of them.
White.calculation: The drag effect and chance to apply a Mark of Water are lowered if the target's level is higher than 120

Green.name: Chain Lightning
Green.description: Launches an electrical charge hitting each enemy one by one. Depends on Magic attack.
Green.calculation: Damage per target: 35% Mag. atk +6000

Blue.name: Lightning Bolt
Blue.description: Strikes the nearest enemy with a lightning bolt, dealing damage and stunning them for 4 seconds. Enemies with a Mark of Water are prioritized. Depends on Magic attack.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 45% Mag. atk +7200, Chance to stun is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Violet.name: Conductance
Violet.description: All of Lars' attacks against enemies with a Mark of Water deal more damage and stun them for a longer period of time.

Lian.name: Lian

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Health, Magic attack)

Lian.description: Following the path of love, the fox turned into a beautiful girl. But her happiness was short-lived, as her beloved fell in a battle. Crushed by grief, but strong in spirit, Lian decided to fight evil with the power of sincere feelings.

White.name: Enchantment
White.description: Charms all enemies, putting them to sleep for 7 seconds. Sleeping enemies wake up immediately when taking damage from anyone other than Lian.
White.calculation: Charm chance lowered if the target's level is higher than 120

Green.name: Hypnotic Ball
Green.description: Fires a magical ball at the nearest enemies, then brings it back, dealing pure damage on the way.
Green.calculation: Damage: 50% Mag. atk +6000

Blue.name: Wandering Lights
Blue.description: Creates 5 magical spheres and launches them at the nearest enemy, dealing magical damage.
Blue.calculation: Magic sphere damage: 30% Mag. atk +3600

Violet.name: Conciliation
Violet.description: Passive skill. When Lian is damaged, the enemy who dealt damage is charmed for 4 seconds
Violet.calculation: Charm chance lowered if the target's level is higher than 120

Lilith.name: Lilith

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic penetration, Magic attack)

Lilith.description: She's the Archdemon's first wife, betrayed by him for a mortal woman. Since then Lilith doesn't believe in family ties. Her passion was for a different kind of relationship, her soul burnt in the fire of feelings long ago, and her heart is filled with a desire for revenge and all-consuming hatred.

White.name: Armageddon
White.description: Explodes the ground under the opponents dealing damage and stunning them for 1 second

Green.name: Nether Breath
Green.description: Hits the opponents in front of the caster with fire

Blue.name: Flame Ram
Blue.description: Dashes to the bearest opponent, dealing damage and pushing them away

Violet.name: Possession
Violet.description: Every time Flame Ram is activated the caster's current and maximum health is increased by a % of maximum health until the end of the fight

Luther.name: Luther

artifacts.book: Defender's Covenant (Armor, Magic defense)

Luther.description: Luther knows no doubt. He is as firm as his faith and directly pursues his goal. Demons have no enemy more hated than this harsh and fearless knight of the Order of St. Bran. He is alone, but only because he doesn't want to put his loved ones in danger. And Luther won't leave his path until he signs the death warrant of each and every demon!

White.name: Omen
White.description: Luther teleports deep into the enemy team, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Green.name: Sentence
Green.description: Stuns nearby enemies and damages them.
Green.calculation: 30% Phys. atk. + 6000. Chance to stun is lowered if the target's level is above 120.

Blue.name: Gehenna
Blue.description: Landing after using Omen, Luther creates a fire wave that deals damage and stuns enemies ahead.
Blue.calculation: 20% Phys. atk. + 3000. Chance to stun is lowered if the targets level is above 120.

Violet.name: Doctrine of Faith
Violet.description: A passive skill. Increases Magic defense.

Markus.name: Markus

artifacts.book: Defender's Covenant (Armor, Magic defense)

Markus.description: A healer of the Order who miraculously survived a demonic raid on his monastery. A divine power, granted from above, helped him defeat his enemies and cure his mortally wounded allies. Ever since Markus has been travelling the world, granting people life.

White.name: Insert Skill Name
White.description: Insert Description

Green.name: Insert Skill Name
Green.description: Insert Description
Green.calculation: Allies healing: 35% Mag. atk +4800, Damage: 35% Mag. atk +4800

Blue.name: Insert Skill Name
Blue.description: Insert Description
Blue.calculation: Healing: 65% Mag. atk +15500

Violet.name: Insert Skill Name
Violet.description: Insert Description

Martha.name: Martha

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Martha.description: A special type of tea grows in the woods of Zarakkar. It grants longevity and heals the most dangerous wounds. Guarded by the Foremother, ancient forebear to all tortoises, the marvelous tea had been hidden from human site until a young woman named Martha received its gift, paying an enormous price in return.

White.name: Foremother's Oath
White.description: Increases all allies' speed by x% for 6 seconds.

Green.name: Secret of Longevity
Green.description: Martha's basic attacks heal her when a projectile hits an enemy. The farther the projectile travels, the more health it will restore.
Green.calculation: One projectile can restore health: 24% health +48000

Blue.name: Tea Party
Blue.description: Conjures a totem in front of the character that restores that allies' health. Enemies can't target the totem, but it can take AoE damage.
Blue.calculation: Health regen for each ally: 60% Mag. atk +30000 for 8 seconds

Violet.name: Healing Brew
Violet.description: White the totem is active, the ally with the least health now receives additional healing.
Violet.calculation: Health regen per second: 15% health +38000 for 8 seconds

Maya.name: Maya

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Maya.description: Maya is a child born against the laws of nature. Impossible love between a human and a titan fell as tears on the fertile ground, and gave birth to such a beautiful, and yet, powerful creature.

White.name: Queen of Flowers
White.description: A magical flower grows around Maya, protecting her from any attacks. Unless it is destroyed, the flower will restore health of all teammates over time.
White.calculation: Health regen per second: 3% Mag. atk +1200, Flower health: 100% Mag. atk +24000

Green.name: Poisoned Pollen
Green.description: Maya hits the most distant enemy with poisoned pollen that causes damage over time.
Green.calculation: Poison deals 25% Mag. atk +12000 pure damage per 6 seconds

Blue.name: Poisonous Bonds
Blue.description: Living sprouts entangle enemies on the far left and the far right, pulling them to each other and poisoning them.
Blue.calculation: Poison deals 25% Mag. atk +12000 pure damage per 6 seconds

Violet.name: Queen's Revenge
Violet.description: Now, when the magical flower dies, its roots entangle the nearest enemies, preventing them from moving and causing damage over time for 8 seconds.

Mojo.name: Mojo

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic Penetration, Magic attack)

Mojo.description: A dangerous child and a naive sage, a fickle troublemaker and a grumbling kind soul, this is Mojo. Be friendly with him, and he'll be your best friend, but be wary of making him angry! A shaman's curse is a terrible thing.

White.name: Totem of Wrath
White.description: Creates a totem that fires magic charges at the enemy team for 6 seconds. Mojo can attack and use skills for the duration.

Green.name: Healing Spirits
Green.description: Heals each ally.

Blue.name: Cursed Bones
Blue.description: Throws a charge at the nearest enemy, which deals magic damage and stuns the target, then bounces off at a random enemy. (Stun chance lowered if the target's level is above #.)

Violet.name: Hex
Violet.description: Marks a random target at the start of combat. Every 2 seconds the mark deals magic damage to the taget depending on how much damage the target received during that time.

Nebula.name: Nebula

artifacts.book: Book of Illusions (Dodge, Health)

Nebula.description: Myriads of stars are falling towards their oblivion. Thoughts create new planets and races. Ideas are embodied into matter; they die and reappear, transforming the despair of death into the joy of rebirth. Nebula knows her war will never be over, for it ensures the welfare of the whole Universe.

White.name: Astral Projection
White.description: Nebula launches a slowly flying projectile. Activation deals damage and disperses the energy of enemies in the area of effect. The total damage and the dispersed energy are split between enemies evenly. The projectile can be activated manually, otherwise it is activated when it reaches the furthest enemy. Depends on Physical attack.
White.calculation: Total damage: 120% Phys. atk +24000, Total energy lost by enemies: 100%

Green.name: Serenity
Green.description: Nebula restores the health of two nearby allies and removes negative effects from them. Nebula can benefit from the skill if there is only one ally left. Depends on Physical attack.
Green.calculation: Recovered Health: 40% Phys. atk +9000, The chance of removing a negative effect is reduced if the level of the enemy that applied the effect is higher than 120

Blue.name: Disharmony
Blue.description: Deals damage to the enemy with the lowest health. Depends on Physical attack.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 100% Phys. atk +15500

Violet.name: Equilibrium
Violet.description: Now Nebula's basic attacks will be switched to support mode. With every activation, Nebula increases the Physical and Magical Attack of one nearby ally by 5 seconds.
Violet.calculation: Temporary Physical attack boost: 100% Phys. atk +13000, Temporary Magical Attack boost: 150% Phys. atk +27000

Orion.name: Orion

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic Penetration, Magic attack)

Orion.description: He is the real mystery of the world of the Dominion. Nobody knows which galaxy he came from or what he is doing in these lands. Some people see him as great danger, a messenger from hell, others praise him as their saviour. But what are the true motives of this great warrior from a distant planet?

White.name: Total Destruction
White.description: Fires 6 magic missiles at the enemies with the highest health. (45% Magic attack + level • 50)

Green.name: Magnet Field
Green.description: Creates an explosion in the back line of the enemy team, dealing damage over an area and slowing the enemies for 4 seconds (slow chance lowered if the target's level is above the ability level) (20% Magic attack + 10 • level)
Green.calculation: Damage: 20% Mag. atk +1200, Chance to slow is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Blue.name: Antimatter Blast
Blue.description: Fires a magic missile at the nearest enemy, stunning them for 4 seconds and dealing magic damage. (Stun chance lowered if the target's level is above the ability level) (65% Magic attack + 45 • level)
Blue.calculation: Damage: 65% Mag. atk +5400

Violet.name: Full Charge
Violet.description: Passive skill: Orion receives additional energy with each attack. (level • 15)

Peppy.name: Peppy

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic penetration, Magic attack)

Peppy.description: What can you do, if you are small, shy and very cute? What if you really want to do good, but have no energy left to struggle against evil? Young Peppy has found a solution! Her incredible performances bring cause for joy to the honest, common people of the Dominion. They are a serious problem for the greedy and the wicked.

White.name: Masquerade
White.description: Magical damage to all opponents. Stuns, blinds or slows them down for 6 seconds. Depends on Magic attack.
White.calculation: Damage: 30% Mag. atk +12000, Chance to inflict an effect is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Green.name: Boldness
Green.description: Creates a shield sphere, that protects one ally for 4 seconds. If the shield gets damaged the closes opponent gets damage. Depends on Magic attack.
Green.calculation: Damage: 15% Mag. atk +6000

Blue.name: Frolic
Blue.description: A fire beam that stuns and damages opponents for 3 seconds. Damage depends on Magic attack.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 35% Mag. atk +9000, Chance to stun is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Violet.name: Trickster
Violet.description: Peppy has the chance to double or quadruple the damage of Frolic (blue)
Violet.calculation: Double damage chance: 70%, Quadruple damage chance: 30%

Phobos.name: Phobos

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Phobos.description: Sooner or later the mind of every living creature succumbs to the cloying grip of fear. You cannot run, you cannot hide. Fear lives deep within us all. Phobos knows this and awaits his time. If you fear death you will die.

White.name: Paralysis
White.description: Stuns a random enemy for 6.6 seconds and torments their body. The enemy can't use skills or attack during that time.

Green.name: Trembling Hands
Green.description: Curses the nearest enemy, reducing their Physical attack and dealing damage to them over several seconds.

Blue.name: Dark Deal
Blue.description: Strikes the nearest enemy with magic damage, heals the ally with the lowest health by an amount equal to the damage dealt.

Violet.name: Mage's Terror
Violet.description: Modifies the first skill: now it deals more damage and also burns the enemy's energy.

Qing Mao.name: Qing Mao

artifacts.weapon: Spear of the Crimson Dawn (Armor penetration)
artifacts.book: Book of Illusions (Dodge, Health)

Qing Mao.description: When Qing Long fell, his sister could not put up with her loss. Every night she prayed to the dead gods of the Land of a Thousand Dawns to give her brother back, and so they took pity and bound their souls together. The gods' pity turned out to be a mockery, and in every battle Qing Mao suffers, releasing that which her brother has become.

White.name: Qing Long
White.description: Summons a dragon spirit that hits the nearest enemies three times, burning them for 5 seconds, pushing them back and damaging them.

Green.name: Spear of Dawn
Green.description: Blinds the nearest enemies and damages them.
Green.calculation: Damage: 20% Phys. atk +3600, Chance to blind is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Blue.name: Dragon's Claw
Blue.description: Deals damage to the nearest enemy based on their current health.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 20% of the target's current health

Violet.name: Open Heart
Violet.description: Qing Mao reduces the target's armor with every attack. The effect lasts until the end of the battle or the target's death.

Rufus.name: Rufus

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Rufus.description: Who could've imagined that Rufus, that merry drunkard, would become one of the revered Guardians? He made a bet with Rakashi the demon, put his soul at stake, and chose a reliable method to win, by drinking his opponent down! Rufus won the bet, and the demon, confined within his shield, became his faithful friend and protector.

White.name: Rakashi's Barrier
White.description:
Rufus covers the team with a shield which absorbs all magic damage.
Shield Capacity: Absorbs x magic damage, where x depends on Magic attack.

Green.name: Rakashi's Mockery
Green.description:
Strikes the enemy with the greatest magic power, dealing damage over time.
Damage: x for 4 seconds, where x depends on Magic attack.
Green.calculation: Damage: 40% Mag. atk +18000 for 4 seconds

Blue.name: Devourer of Magic
Blue.description:
Part of the damage absorbed by Rakashi's Barrier is converted into the hero's health.
Health recovered: x%, where x depends on hero level.
Blue.calculation: Health recovered: 60% of damage absorbed by the shield

Violet.name: Rakashi's Oath
Violet.description:
Rufus can now only be killed with physical damage. If the last attack against the hero dealt magic damage or pure damage, they resurrect with a portion of health restored.
Recovered Health: x, where x depends on Magic attack.

Satori.name: Satori

artifacts.book: Manuscript of the Void (Magic penetration, Magic attack)

Satori.description: The night and the winter forest were the sole witnesses to a wild black fox and a newborn child sleeping, curled against each other for warmth to their final breath. Which of them made the choice, which gave up everything to save another's living soul?

White.name: Ravenous Pack
White.description: The hero's base attacks deal magic damage and apply Fox Fire marks to enemies. When the skill is activated, the enemies take damage for each mark applied to them. Depends on Magic attack.
White.calculation: Damage for each mark: 50% Mag. atk +18000

Green.name: Spirit Purification
Green.description: Satori attacks all enemies, dealing damage and applying a Fox Fire mark. Depends on Magic attack.
Green.calculation: Damage: 40% Mag. atk +3000, Chance to apply Fox Fire marks is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Blue.name: Eternal Wisdom
Blue.description: Each successful base attack steals intelligence from the enemy and restores the hero's health by 200% of the damage dealt. The intelligence steal is active until the battle ends and can't be cancelled.
Blue.calculation: Intelligence Steal: 240, Chance to steal intelligence and restore health is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Violet.name: Imminent Reckoning
Violet.description: Satori applies x Fox Fire marks to enemies each time they gain bonus energy. The energy gained from damage dealt to a hero, using a base attack, using a skill, or killing an enemy is not considered bonus energy.
Violet.calculation: Chance to apply Fox Fire marks is lowered if the target's level is above 120

Sebastian.name: Sebastian

artifacts.book: Warrior's Code (Physical attack, Critical Hit Chance)

Sebastian.description: Fingers strum the strings. A chord, then another! The sounds knock you down like a young beauty’s gaze or an enemy’s pickaxe. The rhythm is the resonant clicking of heels or stray buckshot. The melody is more intoxicating than royal wines, than blood lost by a soldier for the world’s fate. Sebastian is well aware of the great power of art. Music is his weapon!

White.name: Ode of Serenity
White.description: Removes all debuffs from the allied team and conjures a shield that prevents debuffs from being applied 15 times.

Green.name: Battle Song
Green.description: Increases the critical hit chance for all allies for 5 seconds, if they have that stat. Heroes that don't have critical hit chance stat, won't be affected by this skill. In case an ally gets a critical hit chance from an artifact when Sebastian uses Battle Song, they will benefit from it.
Green.calculation: Critical hit chance bonus: 20% Phys. atk +3000

Blue.name: Striking Solo
Blue.description: Ally critical hits deal extra pure damage while they're affected by Battle Song.
Blue.calculation: Armor reduction on target: 20% Phys. atk +600

Violet.name: Public Idol
Violet.description: Sebastian enters combat with a certain quantity of Energy, which depends on his Physical attack stat.

Thea.name: Thea

artifacts.book: Tome of Arcane Knowledge (Magic attack, Health)

Thea.description: Was that the sunrise, or did Thea glance at the battlefield? Wrapping wounded fighters in a wave of warmth, the healer of the Old Grove gifts them with new life.

White.name: Solar Sanctuary
White.description: Heals all Members of the Team. Depends on Magic attack.

Green.name: Healing Beam
Green.description: Heals the ally with the lowest health. Depends on Magic attack.
Green.calculation: Healing: 40% Mag. atk +8400

Blue.name: Vow of Silence
Blue.description: Places magical marks above the heads of the enemy, silencing them for 3 seconds. Chance to silence is lowered if the target's level is above your level. Depends on Magic attack.
Blue.calculation: Damage: 10% Mag. atk +1800

Violet.name: Second Wind
Violet.description: Passively increases the speed of skills for each ally when the ally's health drops below 30%.

Ziri.name: Ziri

artifacts.book: Defender's Covenant (Armor, Magic defense)

Ziri.description: Akhreb Ummi, oh great Mother of Scorpios, help your devoted child. I, Ziri, swear to become your eyes and senses. I will not succumb to anger, nor will I show an enemy mercy. Akhreb's body will protect me from pain, Akhreb's spirit will help me tell Light from Darkness. Come, Akhreb Ummi!

White.name: Focus of Hatred
White.description: Ziri temporarily increases her armor and magic defence and taunts the enemy team, forcing them to attack her for 8 seconds.
White.calculation: Armor bonus and Magic defense bonus: 150%

Green.name: Reflection of pain
Green.description: Ziri activates an ancient curse. The curse reflects 100% of physical damage received by Ziri back at the attacker for 8 seconds.
Green.calculation: Chance to reflect damage decreases if the enemy's level is higher than 120

Blue.name: Shelter of Sands
Blue.description: If Ziri's health is below 30% (but only once every 15 seconds), she burrows into the ground for 7 seconds, avoiding enemy attacks and restoring health.
Blue.calculation: Recovered health: 10% Health +48000

Violet.name: Fury of Akhred Ummi
Violet.description: Now, when Ziri unburies herself, she stuns and throws back any nearby enemies and uses the second skill.
Violet.calculation: Chance to stunis lowered if the target's level is above 120
